tool_description: Validates course prerequisite relationships and ensures proper course sequencing within academic programs and degree requirements.

course_id.description: Course identifier to validate prerequisites for

minimum_gpa.description: Minimum GPA requirement for prerequisite courses

error_messages: Course not found: The specified course_id does not exist in the system.
Invalid prerequisite: One or more prerequisite courses do not exist.
Circular dependency detected: Prerequisites create a circular reference chain.
Invalid GPA requirement: minimum_gpa must be between 0.0 and 4.0.
Self-prerequisite error: A course cannot be a prerequisite for itself.
usage: Provide course_id and prerequisite_courses to validate prerequisite relationships. Optionally specify corequisite_courses, minimum_gpa, and enable circular dependency checking.

prerequisite_chain.description: Complete prerequisite sequence for the course

suggested_prerequisites.description: System-suggested prerequisite courses based on course content
